posts.post_title: WTT: T206 Kleinow/Boston, Smith/Chi & Boston, Lajoie/2 factories
posts.post_content: I have the following for trade.  I'm looking to upgrade my T206 variations or HOF portraits.  Also, all of my BIN's on ebay are available for trade except the T205 Wallace which I'm admittedly too proud of.
